subject: Nutrition
title: Coconut Oil Miracle or Myth
description: Learn Coconut Oil Miracle or Myth in one minute.

hook.text: Coconut oil was called the healthiest fat on Earth. Then the American Heart Association disagreed.

buildup.text: Coconut oil is 82% saturated fatâ€”higher than butterâ€”which raises LDL cholesterol levels.

discovery.text: Early studies in tropical populations showed low heart disease, but those diets also included fish and vegetables.

twist.text: A 2017 AHA advisory reviewed every major study and concluded coconut oil increases cardiovascular risk.

climax.text: Coconut oil works fine for cooking and skin care, but it's not a health food by any clinical measure.

punchline.text: High in saturated fat, low in evidence.
